name: Liang Lin
content: On Journey... | Liang Lin's Website I am a full Professor of Sun Yat-sen University (SYSU)  and Fellow of IEEE/IAPR/IET. My research focuses on the following aspects: Machine Perception and Learning — General Multi-modal Understanding; Holistic Image and Video Parsing; Cross-modal Content Generation — Representation Learning; Foundation Models; Reinforced Agent Learning; Causal Inference and Reasoning Embodied AI Models — Digital Avartar; Human Machine Interaction — Vision-Language-Action Models for Robotics; Long Range Task Planning I am supervising the HCP-I2 Lab: Human-Cyber-Physical Intelligence Integration, SYSU.
